maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Finally! We're here! Look at that huge tree!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Enfin ! On y est ! Regardez-moi un peu cet arbre géant !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: So that's the Grand Krys'kajo? Certainly majestic.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Donc c'est ça le \v[area.tree-dng.name] ? C'est certainement majestueux.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Oui! So... are you ready for the final sprint?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Oui ! Donc... tu es prêt pour le sprint final ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Uhm...\. actually...
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Heu...\. En fait...

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: ...Tronny?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: ... Tronny ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: I-I'm sorry but I really have to leave.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: J-Je suis désolé, mais il faut vraiment que j'y aille.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Noooo...\. Tronny, don't leave us!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Nooooon...\. Tronny, ne pars pas !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Why?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Pourquoi ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: That quest from before just took so much longer than I expected.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Cette quête avant a juste pris plus de temps que ce à quoi je m'attendais.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: I still have things to prepare for an assignment tomorrow...
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: J'ai encore des choses à préparer pour mon devoir demain...

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Neeeeeeeeerd.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Intelloooooo.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Sorry...\. But you know...\. It's fine if you two continue the run without me.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Désolé...\. Mais vous savez...\. C'est pas grave si vous deux vous continuez cette course sans moi.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: It's your competition after all.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: C'est votre compétition après tout.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: No Tronny, you're a part of this as well!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Non, Tronny, toi aussi tu en fais partie !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Except I wasn't there when you ran the Temple Mine, right?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Sauf que je n'étais pas là lorsque vous avez fait le \v[area.cold-dng.name], non ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Well...\. true.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Oui bon...\. C'est vrai.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Sorry, but I really have to log out now.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Désolé, mais il faut vraiment que je me déconnecte maintenant.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: We can do the run together tomorrow if you like, but again it's fine if you continue without me.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: On peut faire la course demain si vous voulez, mais encore, c'est pas grave si vous continuez sans moi.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Hm...\. tough decision.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Hum...\. C'est difficile de choisir.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Anyway, see you two soon!\. Good bye!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: En tout cas, on se revoit bientôt !\. À plus !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Bye!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Bye !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Au revoir you little nerd.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Au revoir, espèce de petit intello.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Oh, come on.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Roh, allez.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Logout
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Déconnexion

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Assignment blah blah.\. Have to log off blah.\. Responsibility blah.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Devoir bla bla bla.\. Doit bientôt se déconnecter bla bla.\. Responsabilité bla.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: What?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Hein ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Oui, oui. It was the same for me before, I know...
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Oui, oui. C'était pareil pour moi avant, je sais.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Anyway, what should we do?\. Should we continue the race or not?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: En tout cas, qu'est-ce qu'on devrait faire ?\. Est-ce qu'il faut continuer la course ou pas ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Here we are!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Nous y voilà !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: The Grand Krys'kajo, crown of the jungle!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Le \v[area.tree-dng.name], le roi de la jungle !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Finally.\. They sure added enough obstacles along the way.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Enfin.\. C'est qu'ils en ont mis des obstacles sur le chemin.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Well then, ready for the final run?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Bon alors, prêt pour le dernier donjon ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Honestly? No.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Pour être honnête ? Non.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Huh?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Hein ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: I've had enough for today. We just ran two whole dungeons in a row.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: J'en ai eu assez pour aujourd'hui. On vient de courir deux donjons en une fois.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Also the whole thing is a bit too stressful for my taste.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Et sinon tout ça c'est un peu trop tressant à mon goût.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Have the dungeons been too difficult?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Est-ce que les donjons étaient trop difficiles ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: No, I mean your constant nagging while you waited for me.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Non, je veux dire, le fait que tu râles tout le temps pendant que tu m'attendais.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Oh...\. I was just wondering whether you've been stuck.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Oh...\. Je me demandais juste si tu étais peut-être coincé.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: I didn't ask for help.\. I just like to take things slow.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Je n'ai pas demandé de l'aide.\. Je voulais juste faire les choses calmement.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Alright...
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: OK...

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: So no Grand Krys'kajo today.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Donc pas de \v[area.tree-dng.name] aujourd'hui.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: That's a shame. I was looking forward to running it today.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: C'est dommage. J'aurais bien voulu le terminer aujourd'hui.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Just climb up that tree yourself then.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Alors va monter dans cet arbre tout seul alors.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: I'll do it myself tomorrow and take it slow.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: J'irais juste le faire demain au calme.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: And that's really fine with you?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Et ça va aller pour toi ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Sure, I'd rather just logout now.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Bien sûr, je préfèrerais juste me déconnecter là.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Oh, look who's over there. Hi Lea!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Oh, regarde qui est là. Salut, Lea !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Hi!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Salut !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Hm...
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Mmm...

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Here's an idea: how about you join Lea's party again and run the dungeon with her?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Tiens, j'ai une idée : Qu'en dit tu si tu rejoins encore le groupe de Lea et que tu fasses le donjon avec elle ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Huh?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Hein ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Anyway, I'm off.\. Bye!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: En tout cas, j'y vais.\. Bye !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Logout
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Déconnexion

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Bye?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Bye ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: That was quick.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: C'était rapide.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Bonjour Monsieur Grasshead.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Bonjour, Monsieur Tête d'Herbe.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Oh, you're here, too?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Oh, Tu es là toi aussi ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: What did your friend just say there? Join Lea's party... \c[3]again\c[0]?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Qu'est-ce que ton ami vient de dire là ? Rejoindre le groupe de Lea... \c[3]encore\c[0] ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Yes?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Oui ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: You two...\. have played in a party?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Vous deux...\. avez joués dans un groupe ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Indeed. We had a most formidable party just two days ago!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Effectivement, avant-hier. Nous avons formé un groupe formidable, je dois dire !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: How was it?\. Did Lea \c[1]keep sniping away all the enemies\c[0]?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Comment c'était ?\. Est-ce que Lea \c[1]a snipé tous les ennemis\c[0] ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Yes.\. Yes she did that.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Oui.\. Oui, exactement.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Oui, oui!\. That sounds most formidable.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Oui, oui !\. Ça devait être formidable.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Poor Lea.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Pauvre Lea.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: That must have been rough times. I'm so sorry...
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Ça devait être un moment très difficile. Je suis vraiment désolée...

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: What.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Hein.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Anyway! Together we're 3 people now, non?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Peu importe ! Maintenant on est trois, non ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Do you want to join our dungeon race or not?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Est-ce que tu veux nous rejoindre dans notre course au donjon ou pas ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: You actually make a competition out of this? That's cute.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Vous en faites une compétition ? C'est mignon.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: It sure is, Monsieur It's-time-to-duel.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Bien sûr que ça l'est, Monsieur C'est-l'heure-du-duel.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Look, I usually avoid partying with Pentafist scrubs...
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Bon, d'habitude, j'évite de rejoindre un groupe avec des amateurs Pentafists.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: But with two Spheromancers this might almost be enjoyable.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Mais avec deux Spheromancers cela devrait être amusant.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: What did you just say?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Qu'est-ce que tu viens de dire ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: So yes! I'll join your race!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Donc oui ! Je suis partant !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Oui, no way you'll back out of this now!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Oui, maintenant tu ne peux plus te débiner !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: The race is on! And this Pentafist scrub will kick your ass!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: La course est là ! Et cette amatrice Pentafist va te montrer ce qu'elle a dans le ventre !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Good! What are we waiting for then?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Bien ! Qu'est-ce qu'on attend alors ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: It's time to finally run the \c[3]Grand Krys'kajo\c[0] together with \c[3]Emilie\c[0] and... \c[3]Apollo\c[0]?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Il est temps de finalement courir le \c[3]\v[area.tree-dng.name]\c[0] avec \c[3]Emilie\c[0] et... \c[3]Apollo\c[0] ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Ready to start the race of the huge-ass tree?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Prêt pour démarrer la course de l'arbre trop géant ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Please, this is the \c[3]Grand Krys'kajo\c[0], the most sacred place in Gaia's Garden.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: S'il te plait, c'est le \c[3]\v[area.tree-dng.name]\c[0], l'un des endroits les plus sacrés du \v[area.jungle.name].

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Oui, oui, but are you ready though?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Oui, oui, mais est-ce qu'on est prêt ou pas ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Ready when you are!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Prêt quand tu veux !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Let's enter then!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Entrons alors !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: [shakes head]
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: D'accord, just don't let us wait for too long~
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: D'accord, mais ne nous fais pas attendre trop longtemps~

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: [yes]
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: [oui]

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: [no]
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: [non]

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Hey Lea, don't forget to call Grasshead before we start the race.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Hé, Lea, n'oublie pas d'appeler Monsieur Tête-d'Herbe avant qu'on démarre la course.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: I'm looking forward to kicking his derriere myself this time.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: J'espère bien pouvoir lui botter son derrière personnellement cette fois.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Hey Lea, don't forget about \c[3]Tronny\c[0]! We want to race the dungeon together, right?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Hé, Lea, n'oublie pas \c[3]Tronny\c[0] ! On voulait faire la course ensemble, non ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: So you want to run the \c[3]Grand Krys'kajo\c[0] already?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Donc tu veux déjà courir le \c[3]\v[area.tree-dng.name]\c[0] ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: You should call \c[3]Emilie\c[0] for the dungeon race.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Tu devrais appeler \c[3]Emilie\c[0] pour continuer la course au donjon.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Spheromancer Lea, what about that Pentafist Girl?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Spheromancer Lea, Et pour la fille Pentafist ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: As much as I'd like to have a race between two Spheromancers, we should proceed as was originally planned!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Bien que j'aimerais faire une course entre deux Spheromancers, nous devrions procéder comme cela était prévu !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Lea, what about that dungeon race? You were planning to enter the dungeon together with Emilie... Apollo, right?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Lea, et à propos de la course ? Tu voulais entrer dans le donjon avec Emilie... et Apollo, pas vrai ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Lea, what about that dungeon race? You were planning to enter the dungeon together with Emilie and C'tron, right?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Lea, tu as pensé a la course ? Tu voulais entrer dans le donjon avec Emilie et C'tron, correct ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Read Inscription
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Lire les Inscriptions

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig:
Some ancient gibberish you can't make out. But there is a sequence of arrows below:
---
\i[ancient-code-1] \i[ancient-code-2] \i[ancient-code-3] \i[ancient-code-4] \i[ancient-code-5]
---
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text:
Quelques inscriptions antiques que vous n'arrivez pas à lire. Mais il y a une séquence de flèches en dessous :
---
\i[ancient-code-1] \i[ancient-code-2] \i[ancient-code-3] \i[ancient-code-4] \i[ancient-code-5]
---

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: To the \c[3]End of Grand Krys'kajo\c[0]
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Vers la \c[3]Fin du \v[area.tree-dng.name]\c[0]

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Zoe
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Zoe

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Hi!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Salut !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Hello there!\. Welcome to my little corner!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Oh, bonjour ! Bienvenue dans mon petit coin !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Oh!\. Fancy hair, right?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Oh !\. Ils te plaisent, mes cheveux ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Thanks!\. Your horns are pretty cool, too!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Merci, c'est gentil de ta part ! Tes cornes sont assez cool, aussi !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Can I touch them?!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Est-ce que je peux les toucher ?!

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: [shakes head]
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Uhm...\. I guess not?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Heu...\. J'imagine que non ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Anyway...\. went up the giant tree yet?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Peu importe...\. Tu es déjà allé en haut de l'arbre géant ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: And, did you like the view?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Et, tu as aimé la vue ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: I mean, sure you did!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Je veux dire, bien sûr que oui !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: It's like billions of explosions burning far away!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: C'est comme des milliards d'explosions brulantes très lointaines !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: What's not to like?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Comment on ne peut pas aimer ça ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: [shakes head]
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Oh!\. I don't want to ruin the surprise, then!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Oh !\. Alors je ne vais pas gâcher la surprise, du coup !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Let's just say there's a real special place up there!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Disons juste qu'il y a un endroit très spécial là-haut !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Ohhhh wait!\. Is that a \c[3]mooncake\c[0] you got there?
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Ohhhhh attends !\. Est-ce que c'est un \c[3]\v[item.516.name]\c[0] ce que tu as là ?

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: Yes, those are the best!!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Oui, c'est les meilleurs !

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: It's just too bad they only have the regular kind, though.
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: C'est juste dommage qu'ils n'aient que la variante normale, par contre.

maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.orig: A chocolate mooncake would really hit the spot right now!
maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterior.json/entit.text: Un gâteau de lune au chocolat, ça serait exactement ce qu'il me faudrait là !
